channel.title: Need help with No-ip!
channel.description: OK guys, iv been taking time to edit my server, and also trying to work no-ip. well iv followed all the instruction to many guides, iv done port forwarding, and still nothing has happened. so if any one can help me, i would really appreciate it! :) people that can help also can have a mod or admin postion in my server! mooshyscape will soon be released! :)

item.title: Need help with No-ip!
item.dc:creator: @GDXChris GDXChris
item.description:
@GDXChris wrote:

Hi. I have had that problem before. Its not that you have done anything wrong, its that you might not have the correct IP address. If you are on a LAN (Local Area Network) you may have more people sharing your IP. That can be fixed by simply calling your ISP and requesting your own IP.

Hope that helped!

Read full topic
